data.name: TERA - Spooky Halloween Pack
data.detailed_description:
Lose yourself in the action-packed world of TERA and pick up a pack containing the terrifying skeletal steed – the Blood Moon Courser!


In this breathtaking MMORPG you’ll need to take fate into your own hands, carefully aiming your attacks and dodging enemy spells with the dynamic True Action Combat system. Seven races, 13 classes and countless dungeons, battlegrounds and powerful bosses – TERA pushes the boundaries of the MMO genre!

You must install TERA and create a character before you can use this package.

The package contains:

1x Riding Skill: Blood Moon Courser

Mount up on this sinister skeletal steed and blaze a trail through Arborea as a mysterious rider of the night.

1x Smart Box: Luminous Raiments of the Dead (Permanent)

Send frosty shivers down your enemies’ spines in this creepy costume with glowing green skeleton.

1x Luminous Abhorribbon

The bow on this glowing skull makes for a bizarre yet baleful combination.

1x Luminous Skull

Glare into your enemies’ souls from the empty eye sockets of this skull mask and stop them dead in their tracks.

1x Mr. Cleaver

Not everyone can pull off a hat like this. Warning! May cause splitting headaches.

1x Shape Change: Big Head (7 Days)

Can you be a bit big-headed? Why hide it? Temporarily give yourself a swollen head.

1x Appearance Change Voucher

Change your character’s appearance to suit your desires.

2500x Fashion Coupons

Fashion Coupons can be redeemed in the game for a skin for your weapon or armor.

4x Strong Bravery Potions

Strong Bravery Potions increase your attack speed and skill damage for 30 minutes. They also reduce the damage your receive.

4x Strong Canephora Potions

Strong Canephora Potions increase your skill damage for 30 minutes.

data.short_description: Lose yourself in the action-packed world of TERA and pick up a pack containing the terrifying skeletal steed – the Blood Moon Courser!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 2130 / AMD FX 4130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800 GT / Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX®: 9
  • Hard Drive: 45 GB HD space
  • Network: Broadband internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3570 / AMD FX 6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450 / Radeon HD 4890 1 GB
  • DirectX®: 9
  • Hard Drive: 55 GB HD space
  • Network: Broadband internet connection
